abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33400794, pmid33394006, pmid33395484, pmid33428609, pmid33395380, pmid33393672, pmid33325749, pmid33356684, pmid33411175, pmid33394004, pmid33419869, pmid33394524
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.01.14
